title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. D, pt. 2211 - Procedures For High Income Rent Decontrol
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. D, pt. 2211 - Procedures For High Income Rent Decontrol

State Regulations
§ 2211.1 - Definitions
§ 2211.2 - Income certification forms (ICFs) (Repealed)
§ 2211.3 - Procedure where total annual income as certified on ICF exceeds threshold (Repealed)
§ 2211.4 - Procedure where tenant fails to return ICF or landlord disputes certification (Repealed)
§ 2211.5 - Determination by Department of Taxation and Finance (DTF) (Repealed)
§ 2211.6 - Procedure where tenant fails to provide information for determination by Department of Taxation and Finance (DTF) (Repealed)
§ 2211.7 - Mailing of submissions relating to high-income decontrol (Repealed)
§ 2211.8 - Jurisdictional authority

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. D, pt. 2211

Statutory authority: L. 1983, ch. 403, §
28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
